title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: FULL INTERVIEW: Australia is the third fastest growing vegan market in the world, with the vegan packaged food industry worth $136 million globally. Local vegan company The Green Lion is now stocked in supermarkets, as demand continues to increase. Co founder of The Green Lion Bhavani Baumann says it is “the fastest growing food movement ever”. “It has really grown in the last few years, and for the supermarkets getting on board and taking it seriously – it’s all lead by the consumers,” Ms Baumann told Sky News. Image: Getty
